help-file.title: "CONSECRATE LAND"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Consecrate Land", when cast outdoors, blesses the land on which it is cast. This (temporarily) sacred land heals anyone upon it at an increased rate. In addition, all damage dealt in this room is reduced.
